original_title: All For One: Media Enabled Musketeers
overview: People with disabilities are the largest minority in the United States (57 million people) and in Russia (13 million people). This film follows the adventures of Russians and Americans  with disabilities, who like the characters in the Dumas novel, work together for the common goodâ€¦ but they wield cameras not sabers. They make films to empower themselves, educate the public, create more opportunities, and build friendship between the people of Russia and the United States.
title: All For One: Media Enabled Musketeers
